reference.title: Cassandra Functions (PDO_CASSANDRA)

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
The PDO_CASSANDRA Data Source Name (DSN) is composed of the following elements:
DSN prefix
The DSN prefix is cassandra:.
host
The hostname of the database.
port
The port of the database.

&reftitle.examples;
PDO_CASSANDRA DSN examples
The following examples show PDO_CASSANDRA DSNs for connecting to Cassandra database:
cassandra:host=localhost;port=9601 cassandra:host=localhost;port=9601,host=anotherhost;port=9601
